comment.author: 63385174@N06
comment._content: This is King Street looking west at the corner of Pitt Street. Prouds Jewellers are still at that location though in a modern building. The north end of Pitt Street mall (as it is now) would be off to the left just out of view. The grand stone builing with the domed roof is on the corner of George Street, where the Apple shop is now, an the old Sydney Arcade is the stone facade on King Street partly obscuring it, facade still there.
